BSGlobal LED Lights

Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Read more

Commercial Grade 5MM Christmas Lights with Multi-function Remote Control

  • 8 Lighting Modes

Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on. 8 different light modes to create different styles of atmosphere and enjoy a unique light show.

  • Timer Function & Memory Function

Auto charge during the day and light up at night, 24 hours cycle. And with memory function, retain the mode before shutdown, no need to repeat the settings, saving your time and energy.

  • Durable Green Wire

Thicker and more robust than traditional lights wire. Can withstand the wear and tear of indoor or outdoor use.

  • Widely Use – Decorate Your Life

Perfect for Christmas, party, garden, Valentine’s Day, wedding, home, window, bathroom, festival, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building, shopping center etc.

Specification:

LED Color: Warm White
Lighting Source: Wide Angle LED
LED Quantity: 300 LED
String Lights Length： 100 FT
Lighting Mode: 8 modes
Waterproof: IP54
Output Voltage: 3V
Power Source: Solar Powered

Package Included:

  • 1 x 300 LED String Lights
  • 1 x Solar Panel
  • 1 x Remote Control

item.content:encoded:
Price: $43.21 - $32.19
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:01 UTC – Details)


Capture the power of the sun with raw organic perfect food, packed with the power of nutrient-dense, raw, organically grown greens, sprouts and vegetable juices for the raw energy you need. Raw organic perfect food is the convenient, delicious way to get your Veggie Juice every day. No artificial flavors, sweeteners. By Garden of Life.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.66 x 3.66 x 6.62 inches; 8.5 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0658010114059
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 23, 2009
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Garden of Life
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B002HI1LSI
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Whole food supplement: Our whole food greens supplement provides naturally occurring antioxidants, enzymes, amino acids, essential fatty acids, and dozens other phytonutrients
Immune system support: This superfood supplement supports healthy digestion, detoxification, a healthy immune system, and already healthy blood sugar levels and metabolism
Digestive support: Our greens powder is bursting with live probiotics and enzymes for digestion support
Vegan greens: this superfood powder is vegan, certified organic, and dairy free, with no whole grass fillers and no preservatives

We want the best when it comes to our food. Why would we want anything different for our vitamins and supplements?

We are fanatical about food. We’re different that way. Whether we’re making a vitamin, or a probiotic, or a protein powder, we always start with real foods and these (foods) provide our formulas the power to be their best. We’re different that way, too. The synthetically created, chemical “breakthroughs” from huge commercial laboratories around the world are not for us.

As fanatical as we are over what goes into our products, we are even more obsessed about the things we keep out of them. We hate those synthetic chemicals that most companies use to make their products. This stuff makes machines work faster, and helps factories churn out super-sized containers at higher “efficiency.” We’re uncompromising about your health. Slow it down, make it by hand, grow it in rich soil with enough sun, air, water and time for it to be its best. Harvest it when ready. Treat it with care. Turn it into a power-packed nutritious food supplement. That’s what we are about.

The Science of Whole Food

Your body was created to eat, process, and derive its nutrition from food—real, healthy food. So, when we create our products, we start by looking at food. What is the “good stuff” in quality food that we are missing in our diets? Which of those foods have the greatest potential to impact—and empower—extraordinary health?

Clean is healthy

We start with what goes IN our products—true, whole food ingredients. But we don’t stop there. We also pay very close attention to what we keep OUT of them. And once again, we look at food—real nutrition food. When is the last time you picked up an apple, turned to read the ingredients, and saw a list of chemicals? If it’s not in your food, then we don’t want it in our supplements.

Traceability

Traceability is key to what makes Garden of Life’s products so special. Traceability starts with knowing where each and every ingredient in our products comes from and getting to know each and every source: where it’s grown; the farming practices; how they pay and treat the farm workers—everything. That’s why it’s so important to start with fruits and vegetables that are grown without these chemicals. We want to get the good stuff from foods that are grown without any of the bad stuff.

Read more

Read more

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

From the brand

Lighting has been deeply rooted in the soul of human . In the unity of function and form，lamps not only become masters of creating atmosphere, but also add artistic tone to the space.

EXF has always been endeavoring in the combination of bright and art.

“EXTRA FUN AND BEAUTY for your home decoration” is our design concept and goal. We hope your life will be accompanied by us all the time.

C9 Christmas lights

Solar string lights

Meteor shower lights

Christmas String Lights

【Widely Used Solar Lights Outdoor】: This starbright solar LED string lights is a great choice for Christmas, Wedding, Patio, Garden, Yard, Party, Fence, Porch, Xmas Tree, Roof and so on.
【Energy-Saving & High Efficiency】: This outdoor string lights charging by solar energy, have no extra utility of electric cost, and no need to replace the battery. It can work up to 8~10 hours at night after fully charged under sunshine for 6~8 hours.
【8 Modes & Memory Function】: These solar mini lights have the ON/OFF button and mode button. You can select 8 different modes to satisfy your diverse needs by pressing the mode button. And the built-in memory chip saves your last modes setting, so there is no need to reset it.
*NOTES*: 1. Please power ON first before charging, and it will be charged and light on automatically. 2. Be sure the solar panel is in a sunny location – not in a shady area – and the solar panel faces the sun. 3. If any question about order or product, please contact seller and we will respond in 24 hours.

Read more

EXF warm white solar Christmas lights are perfect for your celebrations outdoors or around your front yard, bring warmth to your home!

An Ideal decor for our outdoor living

With 2022 upgraded solar panel, the outdoor string lights will provide you a better experience of outdoor living. It is an ideal decor for the Christmas trees and fence and more.

Energy Saving & IP65 Waterproof

The solar LED string lights are powered by solar energy, this light will lights up automatically at night and off during the day, no utility energy costs. With its IP65 water resistance performance, it can work as usual even in rainy days when there is still power with the battery, no need to worry about short circuit due to moisture.

8 Lighting Modes & Memory Function

Our solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof have memory function and it will remember the last light setting mode and no need to press the ON/OFF button every day. You can press the button on the solar panel to select any lighting mode you like.

Read more

8 Brilliant Lighting Modes:

  • Combination
  • Waves
  • Sequential
  • Slow glow
  • Chasing/flash
  • Slow fade
  • Twinkle/flash
  • Steady-on

Specifications:

  • LED Color: Warm White
  • LED quantity: 100 LED * 4 = 400 LEDs
  • Switch: ON/OFF, MODE (8 Modes)
  • Charging time: 6-8 hours & Working time: 8 -10 hours
  • String light Length: 33ft * 4 =132ft
  • Wire Length to first LED: 1.5m/4.9ft
  • Space Between LEDs: 10cm/0.32ft
  • Battery: 800MAH Ni-MH rechargeable battery

Read more

HOW to use it?

  • Assemble the lights according to the IM;
  • Remove the protective clear film on the solar panel;
  • Cover the solar panel entirely and press the ON/OFF button, ensure it is at ON mode, then press MODE button to select your favorite lighting mode;
  • Find a place you would like to decorate, make sure the solar panel can be exposed to efficient direct sunshine, meanwhile, this place will not have bright light source at night;
  • Softten the earth with water and insert the ground spike into the earth;
  • Adjust the solar panel and make it face upwardly, tighten the screw, it will turn on at night and turn off at dawn automatically.

WHY it doesn’t work?

  • Please place the solar panel under direct sunshine to charge for one or 2 days and it should be able to turn on as usual.
  • Check the solar panel is ON, cover the complete solar panel. If the lights come on, the button is in the on position.
  • If the sun is not enough weather, or the temperature of the cold season, please charge more than a few days.

Any questions please feel freely to ask us, we will help you solve problem quickly.

4.5

Warm White Christmas C7 String Lights Set of 100 C7 Bulbs Indoor / Outdoor
Our C7 Christmas Lights create a fun, unique look when decorating for any special occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, tents, patios, awnings and Christmas decoration. These bulbs will screw into a socket and last for 3000 hours.
Add an inviting glow to your space with the Weather Resistant String of Clear C7 Bulb Lights. These lights are perfect for weddings, birthday parties, and other gatherings. These are ideal for adding a cozy atmosphere, or a charming and festive accent, to a casual evening under the stars.

SPECS
Bulb Count: 100
Bulb Spacing: 12 in.
Diameter of Bulb: 1 in.
Bulb & Socket Type: C7 w/ a C7 / E12 base
Total Length (end to end): 100 ft
UL Listed for Indoor & Outdoor Use.
100 Lights Included: C7 E12 Base Light sockets, 5 watts per bulb
One bulb goes out will not affect other bulbs; built in fuse for safety and the electrical plug contains a spare fuse; UL listed. Perfect for Outside Christmas Garden Patio Yard Cafe Tent Porch Deck Party Backyard Decoration
Long Lasting Life: 5W 120V bulbs last for 3000 hours
100FT Long: 12″ spacing between bulbs, 6″ lead on both ends
For Installation, always mount the string first before screwing in the light bulbs. For replacement bulbs, please search for ASIN#B07W4915SZ.

From the brand

OBABA is committed to providing a variety of high-quality Christmas decorations, mainly including indoor and outdoor string lights, Lighted Boxes Decorations, Christmas Candy Cane Pathway Lights, Cartoon Toy, Inflatables Decorations, Snow Tube to add color and joy to your Christmas.

240 LED String Lights

End-to-End Expandable: Each colored lights set with tail plug can connect up to 4 sets,the max expandable length is 196 feets, which allows you to decorate the lighting arear with the desired length and pastel lights.
Safety & Waterproof: UL certified 30V output adapter ensure xmas lights safety.IP 44 Waterproof led c9 lights are perfect for outdoor indoor use. BUT the adapter is not waterproof and should be kept indoors.
Christmas Decorations: Fairy string lights can be used at home,balcony,patio,garden,shopping centers. Holiday decor christmas lights outdoor for birthdays,party,wedding,thanksgiving day, also great for Christmas tree,or wherever decoration lighting is needed.
Guarantee & Service: Online response within 24 hours. If you have any questions about strawberry string lights, please fell free to contact us.

OBABA C9 Christmas Lights Outdoor

Extendable pastel lights 50 LED 49ft Waterproof Fairy String Light Christmas Decorations for Patio, Xmas Tree, Wedding Party Decorations.

OBABA Holiday season LED Christmas string lights

Each outdoor Christmas light designs with tail plug, can connect up to 4 sets of C9 string lights.

Make your home shine and sparkle！

Connect end to end to 4 sets

Classic design and energy saving LED bulbs.

Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor Decor!

Specifications:

  • Light Color: Multicolor/ Warm Yellow
  • LED Quantity: 50 Led
  • Total Length: 49 FT
  • Power Source: Adapter Powered (AC)
  • Bulb spacing: 0.65 ft

Read more

Waterproof IP44

Indoor outdoor c9 christmas lights can resist all kind of weather. BUT note the adapter is not waterproof and should be kept indoors.

Safe

UL certified power adapter, low voltage will not overheat . Sturdy construction allows colored christmas lights to be used for multiple festivals.

Application

Led pastel lights string can be used for birthdays, weddings, Halloween, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, graduations, fashion shows and so on.
